title: My Quarto Presentation
text:
Data Science and Its Applications

According to Van Der Aalst and Aalst (2016), data science has applications in many areas.
High-dimensional probability plays a key role in modern data science Vershynin (2018).

title: My Quarto Presentation
text:
#| code-line-numbers: "|6|9" 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Generate data
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

# Create a plot
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title('Sine Wave Plot')
plt.xlabel('X-axis')
plt.ylabel('Y-axis')
plt.show()









Van Der Aalst, Wil, and Wil van der Aalst. 2016. Data Science in Action. Springer.


Vershynin, Roman. 2018. High-Dimensional Probability: An Introduction with Applications in Data Science. Vol. 47. Cambridge university press.
